author: pquerna
msg: Wrap all URLs to messages in a CDATA, so we don't need to go down the path of proper entity encoding (I hate xml).

author: veithen
msg: Eliminated usage of Spring-WS's StaxSource. Rationale: StaxSource is implemented on top of SAXSource and transforms a sequence of StAX events into SAX events. Axiom now has an OMSource that directly produces SAX events from an Axiom tree and this can be used instead of StaxSource.

author: pquerna
msg: Change the sitemap index generator to split the sitemap indexes every 500 entries, as the great GOOG doesn't like big sitemap indexes.
